title: Finding the Nearest Huawei Customer Service Center
answer:
**Finding the Nearest Huawei Customer Service Center**

1. Call the service hotline. In the contacts list of most Huawei phones, you can find the service hotline number +965-22288063. Call the number to ask for the address of the nearest customer service center. 

2. Visit the official website. Visit http://consumer.huawei.com/kw/support/index.htm and select **Support** > **Consumer** > **Service Centers**. 

3. Use HiCare. In this pre-installed application, you can find the Huawei customer service center information under **Service centers**.
keywords: Finding the Nearest Huawei Customer Service Center
